{"id":453632015,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1612794166,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"96 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/453632015/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Island Perimeter","memory":"96 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int islandPerimeter(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        int m=grid.size();\n        int n=grid[0].size();\n        int cnt=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<m;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<n;j++){\n                if(grid[i][j]==1){\n                    if(i==0 || grid[i-1][j]==0) cnt++;\n                    if(j==0 || grid[i][j-1]==0) cnt++;\n                    if(i==m-1 || grid[i+1][j]==0) cnt++;\n                    if(j==n-1 || grid[i][j+1]==0) cnt++;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return cnt;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"island-perimeter"}
